about_the_game:
BURGER IMPACT is a high-speed physics-based action game set in a future where fast food battles against enemy factions in outer space. Take control of Burger, who must journey and battle across the galaxy in order to rescue French Fries from a mysterious entity. Could this be a plot by the nefarious Potato Empire, or are there other forces at play? Built in Unreal Engine 5!

Burger's affinity with Space Ketchup has led to cursory control over Space & Time, including the following abilities:


  • CHARGE ATTACK (JET BOOST): Allows for high-speed zero-gravity travel, as well as for knocking back enemies and obstacles with a high-impact body slam.
  • BURGER TIME: The ability to slow down time to quickly aim or react in dangerous or time-limited situations.
  • ORBIT MODE: The ability to quickly gravitate to and orbit around a target. This not only functions as an aiming mode but also visualizes a series of causality lines from the target for the purpose of setting up chain combo attacks. And it may have other uses as well...
  • TARGET CHAIN: When orbiting a target in close range, Burger can temporarily link together a chain of enemies to knock into each other in succession. Within an active chain, trick shots will succeed with near-certainty. Each successful hit along the chain not only deals more damage but also recovers a portion of the Burger Time gauge.

Key Features:


  • A new type of 3D flying gameplay: Engage in the original “space-billiards realtime combat system” and enjoy thrilling high-speed action! As Burger, fly freely at high-speed, orbit around objects, charge up, and launch objects to destroy stars, enemies, and other obstacles!
  • Original Control System: Simple controls with a variety of advanced techniques to discover! Mouse & Keyboard input, Controller input, and the Steam Deck are supported.
  • Minimal Waiting Time: Extra attention has been put into minimizing waiting time to the maximum extent possible, such that the player is in control nearly 100% of the time. Every cutscene and sequence is skippable, with no lengthy unskippable transitions anywhere in the game.
  • Vegan Mode: This game is Vegan Friendly! With Vegan Mode enabled, you can be assured that no animal or seafood-based products are present in the game!!!
detailed_description:
BURGER IMPACT is a high-speed physics-based action game set in a future where fast food battles against enemy factions in outer space. Take control of Burger, who must journey and battle across the galaxy in order to rescue French Fries from a mysterious entity. Could this be a plot by the nefarious Potato Empire, or are there other forces at play? Built in Unreal Engine 5!

Burger's affinity with Space Ketchup has led to cursory control over Space & Time, including the following abilities:


  • CHARGE ATTACK (JET BOOST): Allows for high-speed zero-gravity travel, as well as for knocking back enemies and obstacles with a high-impact body slam.
  • BURGER TIME: The ability to slow down time to quickly aim or react in dangerous or time-limited situations.
  • ORBIT MODE: The ability to quickly gravitate to and orbit around a target. This not only functions as an aiming mode but also visualizes a series of causality lines from the target for the purpose of setting up chain combo attacks. And it may have other uses as well...
  • TARGET CHAIN: When orbiting a target in close range, Burger can temporarily link together a chain of enemies to knock into each other in succession. Within an active chain, trick shots will succeed with near-certainty. Each successful hit along the chain not only deals more damage but also recovers a portion of the Burger Time gauge.

Key Features:


  • A new type of 3D flying gameplay: Engage in the original “space-billiards realtime combat system” and enjoy thrilling high-speed action! As Burger, fly freely at high-speed, orbit around objects, charge up, and launch objects to destroy stars, enemies, and other obstacles!
  • Original Control System: Simple controls with a variety of advanced techniques to discover! Mouse & Keyboard input, Controller input, and the Steam Deck are supported.
  • Minimal Waiting Time: Extra attention has been put into minimizing waiting time to the maximum extent possible, such that the player is in control nearly 100% of the time. Every cutscene and sequence is skippable, with no lengthy unskippable transitions anywhere in the game.
  • Vegan Mode: This game is Vegan Friendly! With Vegan Mode enabled, you can be assured that no animal or seafood-based products are present in the game!!!
name: BURGER IMPACT: SOLAR STRIKE

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit or Steam Deck
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel processor or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit or Steam Deck
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-10700F or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 6700 XT, Geforce RTX 2070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Burger Action... in Space! BURGER IMPACT is a high-speed physics-based 3d action game built in Unreal Engine 5. As Burger, a space-faring fast food on an adventure to rescue French Fries, engage in the original “space-billiards realtime combat system,” orbiting and launching enemies and Space Fruit!
